article_title: HHS creates minimum essential coverage wiggle room
article_text:
Could individuals use "skinny" plans that fail to meet the new "minimum essential coverage" standards to get out of paying the new penalty on the un- and underinsured?

Maybe.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: Regulators could approve plans that fail to meet the usual individual policy standards.
